summary: Jonathan Vandermark is a music teacher with a weakness for young men with great aspirations and without a pot to piss in. When Sebastian enters his life and takes advantage of John's charity, his life and afterlife will be changed forever.
cast: Alan Cumming|Alison Guh|David Boreanaz|Anne Heche|Whitney Allen|Henry Thomas|Carrie Fisher|Ermahn Ospina|Maria-Elena Laas|Rachelle Lefevre|Karen Black|Jane Lynch|Clay Allen|Susie Park|Desean Terry|Susan Deming|Monique La Barr|Kevin Paul|Tom Poole|Brandon Stacy|Nik Wilcox
title: Escritor Fantasma
